name: Detroit
description: Detroit is the most populous city in the U.S. state of Michigan,the largest city on the United States–Canada border, and the seat of Wayne County.

name: Los Angeles
description: Los Angeles Spanish for 'The Angels'; Spanish pronunciation: [los ˈaŋxeles]), officially the City of Los Angeles and often known by its initials L.A., is the cultural, financial, and commercial center of Southern California.
